general.gigTitle: build, design, redesign, develop, update, clone, or customize wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Certified Shopify expert here to help you flawless
sellerCard.description:
Hi there, I am Manir, a full-stack designer focused on Shopify, with depth knowledge of web designing, Shopify platform, and all e-commerce platforms. 

I do Shopify Store Design, Development, and Customizing Shopify Websites, as well as developing Shopify websites from PSD, XD and Figma.

I can help you with every step of creating and growing a professional eCommerce business or a Shopify store.

Things I love:
• Shopify theme development
• Shopify theme customization
• jQuery/Javascript
• HTML5
• CSS3
• Web Design

description.content:
Are you searching for a professional, highly optimized, and responsive custom WordPress website design for your business?


If yes, then you are in the right place. 


I'm passionate about designing and developing high-quality wordpress websites. I'll build wordpress websites that are suitable for viewing on all screen sizes whether desktops, tablets, or smartphones. Also, I can design and transform your idea into a fully secured, SEO-friendly, responsive, interactive, and Modern WordPress website.


Let's work together to transform your online presence and make it come to life.


What is Included in My Service:


  • Responsive WordPress. Website Design
  • Word-Press Customization
  • High-converting Landing Page
  • Portfolio Word-Press Design
  • Modern, Professional, Responsive Layouts
  • Fully Functional Ecommerce
  • Security, SEO, and Speed Optimization
  • Visually Attractive Layout
  • Full Functional CMS


Why Choose Us?


  • Excellent Communication
  • Unlimited Revisions
  • Free Support for 30 Days
  • Support 24/7


Order with confidence! I offer design and development expertise, cost-effective solutions, and excellent customer service at an affordable cost.

slide.name: build, design, redesign, develop, update, clone, or customize wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to start working?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'd need your WordPress hosting login and Cpanel login credentials to get started

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be responsive across all devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! It will be responsive across all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have a portfolio to share?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can share some of my past work with you, so you see the quality for yourself.

openGraph.title: build, design, redesign, develop, update, clone, or customize wordpress website

reviews.comment: I felt a bit overwhelmed when I first started my website, but the support I received was incredible! He took the time to walk me through everything step by step, and I never felt rushed. His patience and clear explanations really boosted my confidence to make the necessary changes. I highly recommend him!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you :)

reviews.comment:
Average, Could Be Better

The seller delivered the project on time, but the results fell below my expectations. Some instructions were not fully followed, and inconsistencies in the work required me to step in for corrections and improvements.

Communication was acceptable, but I felt that my requests were not always understood or addressed as I hoped.

For simple needs, this might work fine, but if your project requires a certain level of finesse or attention to detail, I recommend thoroughly clarifying expectations upfront.

For someone starting out building a website, there wasn't much direction on what I could offer him to make sure the process was as smooth as possible. That being said, because I didn't have much to offer him, he was more focused on building out the format than all the details. Understandably. With more direction next time I'm sure the site would be even better!!
Website was overall very good, I would defiantly book again. The only problem were small issues with the website but he fixed all of them very good

seller_response.comment: We’re so glad you’re satisfied with our service!

reviews.comment: I had a GREAT experience with Manir.  He got the project put together the right way THE FIRST TIME.  He was incredibly responsive to any messages I sent him and he had the project done AHEAD OF TIME.  I wish I had known about him 5 years ago when I had the last upgrade done on my website.  He knocked it out of the park.  I would recommend him to anyone needing help with their Wordpress site without reservation.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for appreciating my work and keeping a close eye on my services that will be my pleasure.
